content:
@Lloyd McKenzie can you fix the typos here:
"Behavior: Capability Statements
The following artifacts define the specwhenic capabilities that dwhenferent types of systems complying with this implementation guide are expected to have. Systems complying with the implementation guide are expected to declare conformance to one or more of the following capability statements."

I'm assuming that is in the template somewhere as I can't find it to edit.
I think it looks good like that
Those should be fixed in the version I had to roll back... :(

I think it looks good like that

Nobody reads that stuff anyway!
Actually, let's face facts - everybody's gonna head straight for the examples and ignore the rest of the IG...
If you get affirmatives that don't point out the issue, it means you need to take them with a grain of salt...
